channel.title: Artifact on Risk & Compliance Labs
channel.description: Recent content in Artifact on Risk & Compliance Labs

item.title: Accessing AWS Compliance Reports
item.description: In this workshop you will access AWS Artifact and download a compliance report and work through guidance on how to interpret the report. This workshop is a great place to start if you are new to AWS, it mixes a bit of hands-on with supporting theory. Duration The lab should take approximately 30 minutes to complete. Learning Outcome This workshop provides an introduction to compliance at AWS including the Shared Responsibility Model.
